name: LinearExpression
description: A Band-compatible expression for static prices. We have snipped out all of the Band math since we did not have a use for it in this context. This contract calculates reserve amounts for a bonding curve which price goes up linearly with the amount of tokens issued.

functionDecorators.name: evaluate
functionDecorators.description: This function uses the classic linear formula y = m*x + b where y = price, m = slope, b = starting ordinate If we want to calculate the amount of tokens in reserve, this would be the integral of this price function R = m*x^2 + b*x + c Given that we want to calculate the reserve between 0 and x... we can actually get rid of the constant term.
